AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Court: legal body presiding over the case involving defendants Ricardo Rodriguez, Jr. and Ignacio Rodriguez, Jr., with relevant case law regarding reasonable suspicion for traffic stops
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Farm-to-Market Road 2050: paved road with two lanes, one in each direction, and no shoulder, where vehicles are likely to be stopped by Border Patrol for inspection, with average daily traffic data collected by the Texas Department of Transportation
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.U.S. 59: route for smugglers to avoid checkpoints
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Texas Department of Transportation: organization providing traffic data and responsible for determining traffic flow on roads such as FM 2050 and U.S. 59
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Austin, Texas: location of the Transportation, Planning, and Programming Division of the Texas Department of Transportation
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Laredo Division: division of the Texas Department of Transportation responsible for the Laredo area
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Texas: state where the roads and departments are located, with relevant case law regarding reasonable suspicion for Border Patrol stops
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Freer immigration checkpoint: location where Jorge Luis Trevino has worked, near the intersection of Highway 16 and U.S. 59
